mapper.sql:
SELECT dl.id,dl.pid, dl.bill_id,dl.row_number, dl.purconfirm_bill_id, dl.purconfirm_row_number, dl.pur_bill_id, dl.pur_row_number, dl.pur_bill_date, dl.apply_bill_id,dl.sale_bill_id, dl.delivery_date,dl.prov_goods_id, dl.goods_gg, dl.goods_mrfs_id,dl.made,dl.hos_goods_id, dl.hos_goods_code, dl.hos_goods_name, dl.prov_goods_erp_code,dl.prov_goods_erp_name, dl.batch_num, dl.is_unique_code, dl.batch_code, dl.sterilization_code, dl.sterilization_end_date, dl.sterilization_date, dl.expdt_end_date,dl.receive_qty, dl.rejected_qty_unit, dl.rejected_qty,dl.product_date, dl.send_unit,dl.send_scale, dl.send_qty, dl.send_price,dl.sub_send_price,dl.hos_unit, dl.hos_qty,dl.hos_price,dl.out_storearea, dl.out_kind, dl.sum_row, dl.memo, dl.barcode, dl.packet_code,dl.certificate_code, dl.source_data, dl.is_exchange, dl.send_temprature, dl.send_humidity, dl.version,dl.status, dl.unique_kind,v.hit_code as hit_code,v.mfrs_name as goods_mrfs_name,
COALESCE(cd.can_send_qty,0) can_send_qty, COALESCE(pgi.pur_price,0) pur_price, COALESCE(pgi.sale_price,0) sale_price
FROM distr_bill_list dl LEFT JOIN distr_bill d on dl.pid= d.id LEFT JOIN v_pro_hos_goodsinfo v on d.purchase_company_id = v.hos_id and v.prov_id = d.prov_id and dl.hos_goods_id = v.id
left join prov_goods_hos pgi on dl.prov_goods_id = pgi.prov_goodsid and d.prov_id = pgi.prov_id and d.purchase_company_id = pgi.hos_id and v.his_code = pgi.his_code left join ( select pc.pid,pc.row_number,
pc.pur_qty-if(yf.send_qty,yf.send_qty,0) as can_send_qty
pc.pur_qty -decode(yf.send_qty, null, 0) AS can_send_qty
from purconfirm_list pc left join ( select nd.purconfirm_bill_id,nd.purconfirm_row_number,sum(nd.send_qty) send_qty from distr_bill_list nd inner join distr_bill db on nd.pid = db.id where db.status >='20' and db.status <='40' group by nd.purconfirm_bill_id,nd.purconfirm_row_number) yf on pc.pid=yf.purconfirm_bill_id and pc.row_number = yf.purconfirm_row_number ) cd on dl.purconfirm_bill_id = cd.pid and dl.purconfirm_row_number = cd.row_number
mapper.insert:
insert into distr_bill_list (id,pid,bill_id,row_number,purconfirm_bill_id,purconfirm_row_number,pur_bill_id,pur_row_number, pur_bill_date,apply_bill_id,sale_bill_id,delivery_date,prov_goods_id,goods_gg,goods_mrfs_id,made,hos_goods_id, hos_goods_code,hos_goods_name,prov_goods_erp_code,prov_goods_erp_name,batch_num,is_unique_code,batch_code, sterilization_code,sterilization_end_date,sterilization_date,expdt_end_date,product_date,send_unit,send_scale,send_qty, receive_qty,rejected_qty,rejected_qty_unit,send_price,sub_send_price,hos_unit,hos_qty, hos_price,out_storearea,out_kind,sum_row,memo,barcode,packet_code,certificate_code,source_data,is_exchange,send_temprature,send_humidity,version,status,unique_kind, transport_type,last_update_datetime)
(select #{item.id},#{item.pid},#{item.billId},#{item.rowNumber},#{item.purconfirmBillId},#{item.purconfirmRowNumber}, #{item.purBillId},#{item.purRowNumber},#{item.purBillDate}, #{item.applyBillId},#{item.saleBillId},#{item.deliveryDate},#{item.provGoodsId},#{item.goodsGg},#{item.goodsMrfsId}, #{item.made},#{item.hosGoodsId},#{item.hosGoodsCode}, #{item.hosGoodsName},#{item.provGoodsErpCode},#{item.provGoodsErpName},#{item.batchNum},#{item.isUniqueCode}, #{item.batchCode},#{item.sterilizationCode},#{item.sterilizationEndDate},#{item.sterilizationDate},#{item.expdtEndDate}, #{item.productDate},#{item.sendUnit},#{item.sendScale},#{item.sendQty},#{item.receiveQty},#{item.rejectedQty},#{item.rejectedQtyUnit}, #{item.sendPrice},#{item.subSendPrice},#{item.hosUnit}, #{item.hosQty}, #{item.hosPrice},#{item.outStorearea}, #{item.outKind}, #{item.sumRow},#{item.memo},#{item.barcode},#{item.packetCode},#{item.certificateCode}, #{item.sourceData},#{item.isExchange},#{item.sendTemprature},#{item.sendHumidity},1,#{item.status},#{item.uniqueKind},#{item.transportType}, sysdate from dual )
mapper.update:
update distr_bill_list
pid = #{pid},
bill_id = #{billId},
row_number = #{rowNumber},
purconfirm_bill_id = #{purconfirmBillId},
purconfirm_row_number = #{purconfirmRowNumber},
pur_bill_id = #{purBillId},
pur_row_number = #{purRowNumber},
pur_bill_date = #{purBillDate},
apply_bill_id = #{applyBillId},
sale_bill_id = #{saleBillId},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate},
prov_goods_id = #{provGoodsId},
goods_gg = #{goodsGg},
goods_mrfs_id = #{goodsMrfsId},
made = #{made},
hos_goods_id = #{hosGoodsId},
hos_goods_code = #{hosGoodsCode},
hos_goods_name = #{hosGoodsName},
prov_goods_erp_code = #{provGoodsErpCode},
prov_goods_erp_name = #{provGoodsErpName},
batch_num = #{batchNum},
is_unique_code = #{isUniqueCode},
batch_code = #{batchCode},
sterilization_code = #{sterilizationCode},
certificate_code = #{certificateCode},
sterilization_end_date = #{sterilizationEndDate},
sterilization_date = #{sterilizationDate},
expdt_end_date = #{expdtEndDate},
product_date = #{productDate},
send_unit = #{sendUnit},
send_scale = #{sendScale},
send_qty = #{sendQty},
receive_qty = #{receiveQty},
send_price = #{sendPrice},
sub_send_price = #{subSendPrice},
hos_unit = #{hosUnit},
hos_qty = #{hosQty},
hos_price = #{hosPrice},
out_storearea = #{outStorearea},
out_kind = #{outKind},
sum_row = #{sumRow},
memo = #{memo},
barcode = #{barcode},
packet_code = #{packetCode},
source_data = #{sourceData},
is_exchange = #{isExchange},
send_temprature = #{sendTemprature},
send_humidity = #{sendHumidity},
status = #{status},
rejected_qty_unit = #{rejectedQtyUnit},
rejected_qty = #{rejectedQty},
unique_kind = #{uniqueKind},
last_update_datetime = sysdate(),
last_update_datetime = sysdate,
version=version+1,
and id = #{id} and version= #{version}
